    • parseTournamentCommand

      public boolean parseTournamentCommand(GameState p_gameState, String p_operationName, String p_argumentType, GameEngine p_gameEngine) throws InvalidMap, InvalidCommand
      This method will parse tournament command into tournament object.
      Parameters:
      p_gameState - current game state.
      p_operationName - operation available in the command.
      p_argumentType - argument available in the command
      p_gameEngine - game engine
      Returns:
      boolean returns true if parsing is successful otherwise it will return false.
      Throws:
      InvalidMap - if map is invalid then returns true
      InvalidCommand - if command is logically or syntactically invalid

    • validateTournamentArguments

      public boolean validateTournamentArguments(List<Map<String,String>> p_operations, Command p_commandType)
      Validation of Tournament command.
      Parameters:
      p_operations - command's operation list
      p_commandType - tournament command
      Returns:
      true if command is valid or else false
